projects.ProjectDescription: A full stack application that I team led to create. The application allows user to search a location to find tennis courts nearby. My team and I created a database using Microsoft Azure. We built the frontend in Next.js where we fetched data from our database to populate the information. We also intergrated Mapbox into the application.

Using a Pokemon API, I designed a Pokemon applicaiton that can search for pokemon, displaying information such as their Pokedex number, their Type, all their moves, all thei abilities, their evelotuionary tree, and other information.
A tip calculator built using React. The tip calculator was built to look as cloase as possible to a design from FrontEndMentor.io
A compilation of minor projects put altogether using React.
